____________________________

“Daddy, look. That's Mommy.”
                                  My son giggled.

    Looking at the direction he was
    pointing, I saw it, my dead wife's
    reflection in the mirror.


What was even more horrifying was the word 'RUN' etched into the glass.
c:
I'm unsure how she got out. I'd made sure to bury her even deeper this time.
